tactic: destruct (prime_algo p) as [Hprime2 | Hprime3]; clear prime_algo.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros p H. destruct (prime_algo p) as [Hprime2 | Hprime3]; clear prime_algo. - left. exists p. split. + split. apply Hprime2. apply prime_ge_2. apply Hprime2. + apply Hprime2. - right. apply Hprime3.
